resources.name: aihappey-chat
resources.title: aihappey Chat UI
resources.description: Frontend chat application for aihappey. Provides a clean, model-agnostic chat UI with streaming, tool calls, provider selection, and MCP-compatible interactions.

resources.name: aihappey-ai
resources.title: aihappey Core AI backend
resources.description: Central AI backend powering aihappey. Implements provider-agnostic inference, OpenAI-compatible APIs, Vercel AI SDK endpoints, streaming, reranking, image, speech, and tool execution.

resources.name: aihappey-mcp
resources.title: aihappey MCP servers
resources.description: Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers exposing structured resources, prompts, and tools for aihappey. Enables AI-native integrations instead of ad-hoc AI features.

resources.name: aihappey-agents
resources.title: aihappey Agent runtime
resources.description: Agent implementations built on top of MCP and the aihappey backend. Focused on task execution, tool orchestration, and long-running agentic workflows.
